```{r}
library(tidyverse)

library(mapview)
```

#
pge_20_elec <- readRDS("pge_20_elec.rds")
pge_final <-
  pge_20_elec %>% 
  filter(
    CUSTOMERCLASS %in% 
      c(
        "Elec- Residential",
        "Elec- Commercial"
      )
  ) %>% 
  select(
    -c(YEAR, COMBINED, AVERAGEKWH)
  ) %>% 
  group_by(MONTH, CUSTOMERCLASS) %>% 
  summarize(
    TOTALKWH = 
      sum(
        TOTALKWH, 
        na.rm = T
      ),
    TOTALCUSTOMERS =
      sum(
        TOTALCUSTOMERS,
        na.rm = T
      )
  ) %>% 
  mutate(
    AVERAGEKWH =
      TOTALKWH/TOTALCUSTOMERS
  )
